lines.text: Uh… well. He’s got a bleeding hole in him, is the thing.
I think… maybe… he got shot?
I mean, there was a gunshot earlier, and here’s a guy with a bullet hole in him.
This case doesn’t exactly call for Sherlock Holmes, does it?
What about those robes? Looks like they’ve been burnt. You don’t think he died from the fire?
Eh… probably not. The scorch marks don’t really reach the rest of him- it’s just the clothes.
I doubt this guy even got burned, much less, like… burned up.
Hm. Guess you’re right, there. Let’s go with that for now.
